c1.name: Excellent Blood
c1.descriptionRaw: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.
c1.description: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c2.name: Never-Ending Performance
c2.descriptionRaw: While <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> is in effect, for each opponent defeated, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.
c2.description: While Glacial Waltz is in effect, for each opponent defeated, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

c3.name: Dance of Frost
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Kiss
c4.descriptionRaw:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.
c4.description:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

c5.name: Frostbiting Embrace
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Glacial Whirlwind
c6.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.
c6.description: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.
